VideoOverlay.mode

Function/Meaning
Overlay or layer rendering specification
Type
Property of VideoOverlay class (read/write)
Description
Indicates whether it is in overlay mode, layer rendering mode, or mixer mode. You can also set the value.
It will be vomOverlay for overlay mode, vomLayer for layer rendering mode, vomMixer for mixer mode, and vomMFEVR for Media Foundation mode.
vomMFEVR mode can only be used in version 1.2.0 or later.
